description:
Crafted with female cyclists in mind, these Thermal Bibs deliver an exceptional fit and comfort for cooler rides. The added length not only flatters but also offers thermal protection. Featuring industry leading Superroubaix™ fabric for superior warmth and breathability, these bibs ensure a comfortable ride. Plus, the reflective back panel enhances visibility in low light, while the inclusion of light, wide mesh straps and a double-layered calf band completes this thoughtful design

  • Designed specifically for women, these Thermal Bibs prioritize fit and comfort on cooler rides
  • Industry-leading Superroubaix™ fabric guarantees exceptional comfort, warmth, and breathability
  • Women-specific top-quality Italian-made custom CyTech chamois pad
  • Extra length for both a flattering shape and added thermal protection
  • Enhanced visibility in low-light conditions thanks to a reflective back panel
  • Enjoy comfort throughout your ride with light and wide mesh straps
  • A double-layered calf band adds to the overall comfort and fit
  • Regular fit for comfort
name: Peppermint Thermal Bib Tights - Women's
